snippet.title: PlanetSide 2 Official Trailer -- Epic First Person Shooter!
snippet.description:
PLAY FREE NOW: https://www.planetside2.com/?cid=1063863

PlanetSide 2 takes all the groundbreaking features from the original game -- massive multiplayer battles, distinct empires to rally around, and enormous continents where intense ground and air combat unfolds -- and adds features that modern gamers have come to expect out of the FPS and MMO genres.

Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel, and get notified of future game trailers, videos and more: http://www.youtube.com/planetside2 
Check us out on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/planetside2 
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/planetside2
Add us to your circles on Google+: https://plus.google.com/+planetside2
